attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please sign this if you can relate to two of these:
1) Bilderberg discussions to be made public knowledge
or
2) Who are the organisers 
or
3) Who attend
or
4) What they intend

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
